hey guys really interesting post i saw someone posted code on reddit and i wanted to give my thought on why some stuff getting removed i tried to compare a lot of stuff posted here to exhentai to see if it was removed on exhentai too and here my thought 

first there most of the stuff is kairakuten and comic x eros its getting removed because its licensed by wani magazine most of the stuffgetting removed here are chinese translated  gallery and they are still avaible on exhentai and every other site because wani  and fakku doesnt care about chinese translation but its getting removed on nhentai i dont know why 

next there exteme loli stuff getting removed + weird disgusting or ultra gore stuff this was clearly handpicked no way the bots did it i dont think it was an automated removal 

next ive seen a lot of really old doujin getting removed for absolutely no reason again i dont know why maybe their bots just sucks most of those gallery are still on exhentai not expunged at all
